    • Uses of Encoder in org.numenta.nupic.encoders

      Subclasses of Encoder in org.numenta.nupic.encoders 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdaptiveScalarEncoder
      This is an implementation of the scalar encoder that adapts the min and max of the scalar encoder dynamically.
      class  CategoryEncoder
      Encodes a list of discrete categories (described by strings), that aren't related to each other, so we never emit a mixture of categories.
      class  CoordinateEncoder 
      class  DateEncoder
      DOCUMENTATION TAKEN DIRECTLY FROM THE PYTHON VERSION: A date encoder encodes a date according to encoding parameters specified in its constructor.
      class  DeltaEncoder 
      class  GeospatialCoordinateEncoder 
      class  LogEncoder
      DOCUMENTATION TAKEN DIRECTLY FROM THE PYTHON VERSION: This class wraps the ScalarEncoder class.
      class  MultiEncoder
      A MultiEncoder encodes a dictionary or object with multiple components.
      class  PassThroughEncoder<T>
      Pass an encoded SDR straight to the model.
      class  RandomDistributedScalarEncoder
      A scalar encoder encodes a numeric (floating point) value into an array of bits.
      class  ScalarEncoder
      DOCUMENTATION TAKEN DIRECTLY FROM THE PYTHON VERSION: A scalar encoder encodes a numeric (floating point) value into an array of bits.
      class  SDRCategoryEncoder
      Encodes a list of discrete categories (described by strings), that aren't related to each other.
      class  SDRPassThroughEncoder 
      class  SparsePassThroughEncoder
      Sparse Pass Through Encoder Convert a bitmap encoded as array indices to an SDR Each encoding is an SDR in which w out of n bits are turned on.

    • Uses of Encoder in org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor

      Methods in org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor that return types with arguments of type Encoder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.util.Optional<Encoder<?>> HTMSensor.getCategoryEncoder(MultiEncoder enc)
      Searches through the specified MultiEncoder's previously configured encoders to find and return one that is of type CategoryEncoder or SDRCategoryEncoder
      private java.util.Optional<Encoder<?>> HTMSensor.getCoordinateEncoder(MultiEncoder enc)
      Searches through the specified MultiEncoder's previously configured encoders to find and return one that is of type CoordinateEncoder or GeospatialCoordinateEncoder
      private java.util.Optional<Encoder<?>> HTMSensor.getNumberEncoder(MultiEncoder enc)
      Searches through the specified MultiEncoder's previously configured encoders to find and return one that is of type ScalarEncoder, RandomDistributedScalarEncoder, AdaptiveScalarEncoder, LogEncoder or DeltaEncoder.
